wexpman.domainobjects.utils

Class ZipHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • wexpman.domainobjects.utils.ZipHelper

  • public class ZipHelper
extends Object
    Helper class which contains methods for zipping and unzipping files
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZipHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void combineZipFiles(Map<String,File> namedZipFilesToCombine, File zippedFile, boolean deletePrevious)
      Combines the contents of several zip files into a single zip files, placing the contents of each original file in a separate subdirectory inside the new zip file

      Gets the names of all the entries in the given zip file

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZipHelper

        public ZipHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getEntryNames

        public static List<String> getEntryNames(ZipFile zipFile)
        Gets the names of all the entries in the given zip file
        Parameters:
        zipFile - a ZipFile pointing to an existing zip file, the invoker is responsible for closing this given zipFile
        Returns:
        a List of with the String name of each entry in the zip file

      • getEntryStream

        public static InputStream getEntryStream(ZipFile zipFile,
                         String entryName)
                                  throws IOException
        Gets an input stream for the given entry in the zip file
        Parameters:
        zipFile - a ZipFile pointing to an existing zip file, the invoker is responsible for closing this given zipFile
        entryName - the String name of the entry the stream is requested for, this name must correspond to an existing entry in the given zip file
        Returns:
        an InputStream for the given entry, the invoker is responsible for closing the stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an I/O problem

      • zipFiles

        public static void zipFiles(List<File> filesToZip,
            File zippedFile,
            boolean deletePrevious)
                     throws IOException
        Zips the given files to a zip file
        Parameters:
        filesToZip - a List of the File to zip, must have at least one entry
        zippedFile - a File pointing to a yet nonexistent file, or to an existent or nonexistent file if deleting the previous file is allowed; this file will be a zip file with the contents of the given files to zip
        deletePrevious - a boolean indicating (if true) that the given file should be first deleted if it exists or that (if false) an exception should be thrown in such a case
        Throws:
        IOException - if an there was an I/O problem
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given file already existed or the list of files to zip is empty

      • combineZipFiles

        public static void combineZipFiles(Map<String,File> namedZipFilesToCombine,
                   File zippedFile,
                   boolean deletePrevious)
                            throws IOException
        Combines the contents of several zip files into a single zip files, placing the contents of each original file in a separate subdirectory inside the new zip file
        Parameters:
        namedZipFilesToCombine - a Map with the String identifiers of the files (to become subdirectories in the new file) as keys and the actual zip Files to combine as values
        zippedFile - a File pointing to a yet nonexistent file, or to an existent or nonexistent file if deleting the previous file is allowed; this file will be a zip file with the contents of the given original files
        deletePrevious - a boolean indicating (if true) that the given file should be first deleted if it exists or that (if false) an exception should be thrown in such a case
        Throws:
        IOException - if an there was an I/O problem (including if any of the original files is not actually a zip file)
